# Abdulrahman Ambooka - Portfolio Context

## Summary
Abdulrahman Ambooka is an innovative Full-Stack Developer and Cloud Solutions Architect based in Nairobi, Kenya. He specializes in building scalable web applications, cloud infrastructure (AWS/Azure), and AI/ML solutions.

## Contact
- Email: abdulrahmanambooka@gmail.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/ambooka
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/abdulrahman-ambooka/
- Portfolio: https://ambooka.dev

## Technical Skills
- **Languages**: JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Java, SQL, C#, Dart.
- **Frontend**: React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Flutter, Redux.
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express, Spring Boot, GraphQL, RESTful APIs, .NET Core.
- **Cloud & DevOps**: AWS, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, Terraform.
- **AI/ML**: Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Computer Vision.

## Experience
- **IT Assistant at Hebatullah Brothers Limited** (Jan 2025 - Present): Managing IT operations, digital transformation, and cybersecurity.
- **Freelance Full-Stack Developer** (Jan 2022 - Present): Delivered 15+ projects covering FinTech and E-commerce.
- **Industrial Attachment at Masinde Muliro University**: Network infrastructure and support.

## Key Projects
1. **CloudCommerce**: Scalable E-commerce platform (Next.js, Node.js, AWS).
2. **AfriPay**: Fintech API integrating mobile money providers.
3. **SmartCity Traffic Prediction**: ML system for traffic congestion prediction.
4. **SecureChat**: End-to-end encrypted messaging app.

## Site Structure
- `/`: Home page (About, Portfolio, Contact)
- `/sitemap.xml`: XML Sitemap
- `/robots.txt`: Robots configuration
